channel.title: Web on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Web on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: Generate pull request titles with Copilot on the web
item.description:
GitHub Copilot can now generate pull request titles directly on github.com when creating or editing a PR.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: vscode: Building docfind: Fast Client-Side Search with Rust and WebAssembly
item.description:
The article describes building docfind, a high-performance client-side search engine implemented in Rust and compiled to WebAssembly, and highlights how GitHub Copilot sped up development.

  • Source: Visual Studio Code

item.title: github: One-click merge conflict resolution now in the web interface
item.description:
GitHub added a oneâ€‘click merge conflict resolution feature to the github.com web interface, letting maintainers resolve pull request conflicts directly on the site when those conflicts are resolvable in the web editor.

  • Source: GitHub
